

ABOUT ICINGA2API


icinga2api is a Python module to interact with the Icinga 2 RESTful API.



FEATURES


1.  basic and certificate auth
2.  config file support
3.  objects (zone support)
4.  actions
5.  events
6.  status



DEVELOPING


1.  Code cleanup
2.  Tests
3.  Configuration Management



USAGE


See the doc directory.
